post.description: Enables Spike Protection feature for some of the projects within the organization.

parameters.name: organization_slug
parameters.description: The slug of the organization the projects belong to

schema.description: Django Rest Framework serializer for incoming Spike Protection API payloads

projects.description: Slugs of projects to enable Spike Protection for. Set to `$all` to enable Spike Protection for all the projects in the organization.

delete.description: Disables Spike Protection feature for some of the projects within the organization.

parameters.name: organization_slug
parameters.description: The slug of the organization the projects belong to

schema.description: Django Rest Framework serializer for incoming Spike Protection API payloads

projects.description: Slugs of projects to disable Spike Protection for. Set to `$all` to disable Spike Protection for all the projects in the organization.
